{"id":497900873,"lang":"java","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1621917249,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/497900873/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"39.2 MB","code":"class Solution \n{\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) \n    {\n      int TotalSum=0;\n        int leftSum=0;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++)\n            TotalSum+=nums[i];\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++)\n        {\n            if(leftSum==TotalSum-leftSum-nums[i])\n                 return i;\n            \n            leftSum+=nums[i];\n        }\n        \n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
